spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but door swings in the 3D render are inconsistent with the 2D plan. The transition from the Living area to the long deck/balcony is poorly defined.

structural_fidelity.notes: The primary balcony/deck at the top is missing its outer railing/wall structure, appearing as a closed room. The small balconies for Bedroom 1 and 2 are incorrectly rendered as interior floor space extensions.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement corresponds well to the plan, though the bed in Bedroom 2 has been split into two singles instead of a single queen/king as implied by the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic projection and clean volumetric lighting. Materials are clear and geometry is sharp.

detected_errors.description: Missing horizontal balcony/deck railings and exterior defining walls at the top of the plan.
Bedroom 2 bed orientation and type changed from single queen to twin singles.
Door swing direction for the main entrance and internal rooms (e.g., Toilet 2) deviates from the architectural plan.
The Utility/Kitchen wall proportions feel slightly compressed compared to the Living/Dining expanse.
